TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content: Someone explain to me why the hell Roleplaying is forbidden, there's no visible point behind forbidding that.
..because it was abused in the old forum...

Stop! random time!

Would you press it?

I would do it! I alway wanted to visit the Rainbow Factory...

I would only because there would be something else to do in my free time. Plus then i could explore the factory and yell **** at people. Yes.....YES MWHAHAHA. Wait. would i have to.....be.....a......................pony!?!?!?!

Actualy, it doesn't change anything, exept the fact that Lyra will chase you around.

(just got on a site that generate OC, character history or something and this happen : "MrrPamplemousse is a kind student guy who wants to molests his/her crush so bad", Don't know how to feel about that )

Edit : Remouving a "r" gave me something better : "MrPamplemousse is a shy noble guy who has an amnesia"

Edited November 3, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

I dont know who Lyra is, and yes it does matter. Would clicking yes send me there and turn me into a pony!?!?!

And what is a OC?

Original character, this is one that I've make.

And lyra is anthropophile, she like humans, No, she literaly obcessed by humans.

And clicking yes will transport you, not transform you (But maybe if we follow the logic of Equestria Girl...)

I would push it

Wait how do we know she is obsessed with humans?

Edited November 3, 2013 by briansun1
I would push it because it would be interesting. But since in Equestria everyone is a pony wouldn't going to Eqestria(even via transport) make you a pony? And who is lyra.........

Lyra is a green-mint colored unicorn... Go see it yourself...

http://mlp.wikia.com/wiki/Lyra_Heartstrings

P.S. I never see Equestria Girl so I don't realy know how it's work.

I wouldn't press it.

Because the fandom equestria is an inconsistent clustereff which can't decide whether it's a wasteland or a psychotic place full of obsessed ponies and strange things...

... dang, now I wanna press it.
You see my point dont you.
I see you are playing what appears to be solitare on that most magnificent monitor, Mr. Corgi, but alas, no points.
What I mean is the reason to press the button is to see the cluster**** of whats in there. you summed it up in post 1111.

Ah, yes, that.

Well, as they say, Curiosity killed the cat.

That's why it's hiding on Mars.
Exactly. And what do you mean with your solitaire post?
Corgis like playing solitare.
How did you know?

I am a rainbow dwarf.

I know everything.

Equestria girls sucked.

Still a better love story than Twilight WAIT WUT.

I have to agree with the first part of that post.

The second is debatable because EVERYTHING is a better love story than twilight.
No, see in the movie, Twilight sparkle falls in love, so calling it a better love story than Twilight, makes half sense.

I've seen the film, and although I liked the idea of another main character showing some affection towards another pony (as it'd hopefully expand upon her character a fair bit), I hated the execution. In general, I hate the "love at first sight" love story cliche as it proves just how little the writer knows about romance.

Still, if my short-lived relationship with that toast I had for breakfast today is a better love story (albeit it ended in tragedy for the toast) than Twilight, I guess it sorta makes sense.

I honestly dont care, because im not watching EG.

Edit: My dog and her tennis ball IS STILL A BETTER LOVE STORY THEN TWILIGHT!

Edit: My dog and her tennis ball

*sniff*

So touching... Someone, make this into a movie!
